snippet.title: Tales of the Shire - Official Announcement Trailer - PEGI
snippet.description:
From Wētā Workshop, known for their work in the film industry, comes Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game, a Hobbit life sim set in the Middle-earth universe of J.R.R. Tolkien. Coming later this year to the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam.

Wishlist on…
⬛️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2016460/Tales_of_the_Shire_A_The_Lord_of_The_Rings_Game/
🟦 PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010195/
🟩 Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/tales-of-the-shire-a-the-lord-of-the-rings-game/9pkkjbvpp4gw

Follow us and stay up-to-date with Tales of the Shire:
Official Website: http://www.talesoftheshire.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/talesoftheshire
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/talesoftheshire
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TalesoftheShire
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@talesoftheshire
